::DrillBit::

He responded to KitKat, via commlink.
"Ok, I'll see you in a few." He walked to the conference room.
He motioned to the door.
"If you will follow me, I'll show you too your room. He started walking
out, waiting for Gabrial to follow.(Is Magnus there too?)
